sections.content: Family History: A Primer presents each lesson as a stack of cards. You swipe up to move forward.
You swipe down to move backward. Go ahead and give it a try. We'll still be here when you get back.

Well done!

There are different types of cards in each lesson. This card presents information.

The next card will ask you yes-no questions.
Drag the question in the center to yes or no to answer each question.
